amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit U.S. assistance to the government of any country that does not permit the extradition to the United States, for trial or sentencing in the United States, of individuals suspected of committing criminal offenses for which the maximum penalty is life imprisonment without possibility of parole.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Deal (GA) amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Deal (GA).
